summary: The module provides a set of utilities for handling recent changes in the Open Library system. It includes functions for retrieving and filtering change records, rendering them in various formats (JSON, YAML), handling redirects, and respecting feature toggle settings.
business_intent: To enable the Open Library platform to track, display, and manage recent changes made to its content, allowing users and administrators to view updates in different formats and ensuring that the system respects feature toggles for change visibility.
